localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Pika (pronounced piÂ·kuh, like picker) is an easy to use, open-source, native colour picker for macOS. Pika makes it simple to quickly find colours on screen, in the format you need, so you can get on with being a speedy, successful designer.
nodes.title: Pika - An open-source colour picker app for macOS
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Iteratively prevents wasted time, increased costs, and poor decision-making from bad data by giving product, data and engineering teams the opportunity to collaborate on analytics while enforcing your schema. We empower you to take control of your data ğŸš€
nodes.title: Iteratively - Capture customer data you trust
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Nwcode - is a no-code platform for building powerful web and mobile apps, that can include payments, notifications, and more. Integration with Woocommerce, Shopify in two clicks
nodes.title: Nwicode - Build apps for every platform, without code âœ¨
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Console is a free weekly email digest of the best tools and beta releases for developers. We keep track of everything - dev tools, devops, cloud, and APIs - so you don't have to.
nodes.title: Console - A free weekly email digest of the best tools for developers.
nodes.author: David Mytton

nodes.excerpt: Introducing Smart Components in Framer, a new standard for interactive component design. From complete navigations and buttons with multiple states to nested hover effects, build anything visually and in just a few clicksâ€”no code required. https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF
nodes.title: Smart Components by Framer - Design interactive components with multiple variants
nodes.author: Benjamin den Boer

nodes.excerpt: Bunnyshell is a self-service DevOps automation platform that helps teams cut downtime and deliver reliable applications and services at high velocity.
nodes.title: Bunnyshell - Self-service DevOps automation for any application
nodes.author: Alin Dobra

nodes.excerpt: Data tables are all over the internet, especially Wikipedia. sqanything lets you query the HTML tables in all your open Chrome tabs with SQL. You can send the results of your query to Google Sheets or just send all the tables on a web page to Google Sheets.
nodes.title: sqanything - Query any data tables on the Web with SQL
nodes.author: Alex Iskold

nodes.excerpt: The "frosted glass" effect has been with us for quite some time with each company having its own name for it. In Nov 2020 Mike Malewicz wrote a medium article trying to unify it under one name. Then we created this handy CSS generator. Enjoy!
nodes.title: Glassmorphism CSS Generator - Generate the CSS for frosted glass effect for free.
nodes.author: michal malewicz

nodes.excerpt: Links are the glue of the internet, yet by themselves they're just a string of undecipherable characters. With Peekalink, turn them into rich content your users will be delighted to share and engage in.
nodes.title: Peekalink - An API to magically preview any link âœ¨
nodes.author: Joel HernÃ¡ndez

nodes.excerpt: Three.js Journey is the ultimate course if you want to learn Three.js and create stunning 3D websites with WebGL. Let Bruno Simon guide you through more than 30 lessons covering basics and advanced usage of the library.
nodes.title: Three.js Journey - The best course to learn how to create stunning 3D websites
nodes.author: Bruno Simon

nodes.excerpt: Ray is a beautiful desktop app to fix problems faster in PHP and JavaScript projects. Free demo: check https://myray.app/ 30% discount on Ray: https://spatie.be/products/ray https://spatie.be/products/ray?referrer=product%20hunt
nodes.title: Ray - Dump debugging evolved
nodes.author: Freek Van der Herten

nodes.excerpt: https://www.rutterapi.com helps you build 1 integration that works with Shopify, WooCommerce, and many more Ecommerce platforms. Push & pull Products, Orders, and Customers data with one set of endpoints. https://docs.rutterapi.com
nodes.title: Rutter - One API for every Ecommerce platform
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Fibery is a connected workspace for product teams. It unites user research, ideation, strategic planning, product roadmapping, software development and customer feedback aggregation. Escape scattered tools and make better products with Fibery.
nodes.title: Fibery for Product Teams - All-in-one platform to invent, build and grow your products
nodes.author: Michael Dubakov

nodes.excerpt: React UI Boutique is a set of beautiful UI components built with Chakra UI and Framer Motion. You can use them to jump-start your projects or get inspiration. Create good looking pages without hiring a designer or losing countless hours doing it yourself.
nodes.title: React UI Boutique - Beautiful UI blocks built with Chakra UI and Framer Motion

nodes.excerpt: An interactive space that shows how product management best practices work, including working examples of OKRs, outcome-based roadmaps, along with real examples of ideas, experiments, and customer feedback. Add, delete, and move items around as if you were using the tool to manage your own products.
nodes.title: ProdPad Sandbox - Explore product mgmt best practices in an interactive space!

nodes.excerpt: SVG Waves lets you generate waves instantly with clean simple lines. Quickly create consistent looking wavy patterns that are perfect for use on websites or documents.
nodes.title: SVG Waves - Instantly generate SVG waves - made by a 12 year old ğŸŒŠ

nodes.excerpt: Zaraz boosts any website's performance with one line of code by loading your third-party tools on the cloud instead of the end-usersâ€™ browser. Improve your SEO and conversions in minutes.
nodes.title: Zaraz - A third-party manager that boosts website speed
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Sell access to a google sheet without sharing with the whole INTERNET. Easy to set up via Gumroad. Using gumroad ping, this sheet's script captures all sales and matches the sale with a sheet you assign in. Then gives viewer access to the buyer.
nodes.title: OnlySheets - Sell access to any Google Sheet
nodes.author: Andrew Kamphey

nodes.excerpt: Persona offers a suite of fully-automated identity verification components with worldwide coverage that can be configured and branded to create custom-tailored flows for any use case. Sign up for the Starter plan and start for free in <10 minutes.
nodes.title: Persona - Identity verification for any use case, starting at $0
nodes.author: Dylan Field

nodes.excerpt: Tiny stocks watcher for the menu bar. Add your favorite tickers to always see the current price. Powered by Yahoo Finance API. Buy on the Mac App Store for $0.99 or free install via Xcode. For any further information or features, feel free to contact me.
nodes.title: Market Bar - Tiny stocks watcher
nodes.author: Daniil M.
